title: Getting lag out of nowhere
body:
Hi all
Once in every 3-6 games i get a game where i just lag. I dont know why my pc is pretty good for league of legends. Sometimes i just get up to 3000+ms and it goes up and down all the time. The thing is i dont lose connection from the internet as I still see my allies and enemies fighting sometimes not with sound and i dont see the anyhting move, soemtimes i just see the health bars going down only. then i get no lag for 10 secs and i lag again. And then sometimes i get 500ms and says "attempting to reconnect" and i cant move or do nothing i cant see anyhting not even the health bars. pls help tks cuz i lost a lot of games from this and got flamed a lot

replies.body: Your network seems to be having a lot of trouble, and possibly a tough combination of a weak connection and packet loss.  Go over each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot this towards a fix.  That should get you back in game!
